Articles.Content: After a Space Program rethink with the recent incorporation of LAZORS, I have come across the need for a good mother ship command pod. I have found the cupolas small crew capacity insufficient and the standard MK 1.5 3-man not elegant enough.(I like to travel in style.) I am currently considering either restoring the MPSS nautilus pack to .21 format or the admirable Munox, however something about the original never clicked with me, I think it was the large size; Although the updated one has different configurations which look very nice.
How about the Discovery pod from the Deep Space pack?
